resources.string: Searching for outdoor trails is easy! Just enter your Country, State and City! Once done click the \"Search!\" Button. All these fields are optional, results will take time to load!
This app was created by Joe Passanante using the trail API found at https://market.mashape.com/trailapi/trailapi! Created on 3/7/18 for SER210 at Quinnipiac University!
